short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moon - a timekeeping system based on the lunar cycle

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Moon is a timekeeping system based on the lunar cycle.

Use the Moon extension to decorate your new tab page with a moon time clock, as well as a table of moon time units and a moon time converter tool.
